json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="bgpPeeringAddresses">
<prop type="array" name="customBgpIpAddresses">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="defaultBgpIpAddresses">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="tunnelIpAddresses">
<prop type="array" name="connections">
<prop type="array" name="ipsecPolicies">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="ids">
<prop type="array" name="labels">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="bgpConnections">
<prop type="array" name="staticRoutes">
<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="trafficSelectorPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="localAddressRanges" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="remoteAddressRanges" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="vpnLinkConnections">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="egressNatRules">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="ingressNatRules">
<prop type="array<@IpsecPolicy_read>" name="ipsecPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="vpnGatewayCustomBgpAddresses">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="ipConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="natRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="egressVpnSiteLinkConnections">
<prop type="array<@VpnNatRuleMapping_read>" name="externalMappings">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="ingressVpnSiteLinkConnections">
<prop type="array" name="internalMappings">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create

argGroup.arg: <help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>

help.short: Name or ID of a virtual hub.
The scale unit for this VPN gateway.
Peering address and BGP identifier of this BGP speaker.
Weight added to routes learned from this BGP speaker.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.bgpSettings.bgpPeeringAddresses" options="bgp-peering-addresses" hide="True" group="BgpSettings">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.bgpSettings.bgpPeeringAddresses[].customBgpIpAddresses" options="custom-bgp-ip-addresses">

<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections" options="connections" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.ipsecPolicies" options="ipsec-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.routingConfiguration.propagatedRouteTables.ids" options="ids">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.routingConfiguration.propagatedRouteTables.labels" options="labels">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.routingConfiguration.vnetRoutes.staticRoutes" options="static-routes">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.routingConfiguration.vnetRoutes.staticRoutes[].addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.trafficSelectorPolicies" options="traffic-selector-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].localAddressRanges" options="local-address-ranges" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].remoteAddressRanges" options="remote-address-ranges" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections" options="vpn-link-connections" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.egressNatRules" options="egress-nat-rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.ingressNatRules" options="ingress-nat-rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@IpsecPolicy_create>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.ipsecPolicies" options="ipsec-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.vpnGatewayCustomBgpAddresses" options="vpn-gateway-custom-bgp-addresses" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.natRules" options="nat-rules" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@VpnNatRuleMapping_create>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.natRules[].properties.externalMappings" options="external-mappings" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.natRules[].properties.internalMappings" options="internal-mappings" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="bgpPeeringAddresses" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.bgpSettings.bgpPeeringAddresses">
<prop type="array" name="customBgpIpAddresses" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.bgpSettings.bgpPeeringAddresses[].customBgpIpAddresses">
<prop type="array" name="connections" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections">
<prop type="array" name="ipsecPolicies" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.ipsecPolicies">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_create>" name="ids" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.routingConfiguration.propagatedRouteTables.ids">

<prop type="array" name="trafficSelectorPolicies" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.trafficSelectorPolicies">

<prop type="array" name="remoteAddressRanges" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].remoteAddressRanges" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="vpnLinkConnections" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_create>" name="egressNatRules" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.egressNatRules">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_create>" name="ingressNatRules" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.ingressNatRules">
<prop type="array<@IpsecPolicy_create>" name="ipsecPolicies" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.ipsecPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="vpnGatewayCustomBgpAddresses" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.vpnGatewayCustomBgpAddresses">
<prop type="array" name="natRules" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.natRules">
<prop type="array<@VpnNatRuleMapping_create>" name="externalMappings" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.natRules[].properties.externalMappings">
<prop type="array" name="internalMappings" arg="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.natRules[].properties.internalMappings">

<prop type="array" name="bgpPeeringAddresses">
<prop type="array" name="customBgpIpAddresses">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="defaultBgpIpAddresses">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="tunnelIpAddresses">
<prop type="array" name="connections">
<prop type="array" name="ipsecPolicies">

<prop type="array" name="labels">

<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes">

<prop type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="egressNatRules">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="ingressNatRules">
<prop type="array<@IpsecPolicy_read>" name="ipsecPolicies">

command.name: update

help.short: Name or ID of a virtual hub.
The scale unit for this VPN gateway.
Peering address and BGP identifier of this BGP speaker.
Weight added to routes learned from this BGP speaker.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.bgpSettings.bgpPeeringAddresses" options="bgp-peering-addresses" hide="True" group="BgpSettings">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.bgpSettings.bgpPeeringAddresses[].customBgpIpAddresses" options="custom-bgp-ip-addresses">

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections" options="connections" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.ipsecPolicies" options="ipsec-policies" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.routingConfiguration.propagatedRouteTables.ids" options="ids">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.routingConfiguration.propagatedRouteTables.labels" options="labels">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.routingConfiguration.vnetRoutes.staticRoutes" options="static-routes">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.routingConfiguration.vnetRoutes.staticRoutes[].addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.trafficSelectorPolicies" options="traffic-selector-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].localAddressRanges" options="local-address-ranges">
<arg type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].remoteAddressRanges" options="remote-address-ranges">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections" options="vpn-link-connections" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.egressNatRules" options="egress-nat-rules" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.ingressNatRules" options="ingress-nat-rules" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@IpsecPolicy_update>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.ipsecPolicies" options="ipsec-policies" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.connections[].properties.vpnLinkConnections[].properties.vpnGatewayCustomBgpAddresses" options="vpn-gateway-custom-bgp-addresses" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.natRules" options="nat-rules" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@VpnNatRuleMapping_update>" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.natRules[].properties.externalMappings" options="external-mappings" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$vpnGatewayParameters.properties.natRules[].properties.internalMappings" options="internal-mappings" group="Properties">
